metadata.title: CVE-2016-6612 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. A user can exploit the LOAD LOCALINFILE functionality to expose files on the server to the database system.All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.4), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.8),and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.17) are affected.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
